entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
